metamodel.description:
Check this to generate form models on leading frameworks.
This Form Metamodel allows to model Web Forms to integrate in your web application or web framework customizations.
SIDE provides the modeler to graphically produce form models and various generators to instantiate these models on leading frameworks.
metamodel.name: KSR400 Form

technology.description:
Check this to generate on the Alfresco product line.
Alfresco is the leading open source ECM solution.
SIDE allows to optimize the configuration of the Alfresco content model, views, forms and reports.
technology.name: Alfresco

technologyVersion.description:
Check this to generate on the major release 3.4 of Alfresco.
Alfresco 3.4.d is the leading open source collaborative ECM solution.
Additionally to content generation, SIDE provides useful server components to enhance some features of this release.

generatorVersion.description: This generator generate configuration from Forms Models for Alfresco Share
